title: Fanibah
bio: Professional 3d Generalist, Artist and Sculptor from Nigeria with expertise in creating and design 2D and 3D designs.
bio2: Services include: 3d Modeling, Rigging, Texturing, Lightning and Rendering (with realistic characters, interior and exterior environment), 2D or 3D Animation Video, Explainer Video, Comic Video, Cartoon Music Video, Realistic Video, etc.

title: Elijah
bio: Graphic designer from Serbia with added experience in Web Development, Image Manipulation and Banner Creation.
bio2: Services include: Graphic Design, Web3/Crypto based projects.
